/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from under a large overpass, providing a unique viewpoint of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban jungle. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
